extendedInfo.description: MetaTrader 5 is a platform for mobile trading on Forex and Stock markets. The application allows you to connect to broker's servers, receive currency and stock prices, perform market analysis using charts and technical indicators, trade and view the history of your trade operations. All this can be done from anywhere in the world absolutely free of charge!With MetaTrader 5, you can use real and demo accounts. Moreover, you can open demo accounts right from the mobile terminal. Authorize in the application to access all the functions of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform.After authorizing, you can receive prices of financial instruments (Stocks, Forex) in the real-time mode, execute trade operations using the full set of trading orders and various execution modes. Thus, you can implement almost all possible trading strategies. At any time and from anywhere you can access the history of your trade operations in order to determine the profitability of your trading strategies.MetaTrader 5 offers you the full set of technical indicators to perform technical analysis of Stock and Forex markets: Moving Average, Bollinger Bands, Average Directional Movement Index, Envelopes, Ichimoku Kinko Hyo, Standard Deviation, Average True Range, Bears Power, Bulls Power, Commodity Channel Index, DeMarker, Force Index, Momentum, Moving Average of Oscillator, Relative Strength Index, Relative Vigor Index, Williams' Percent Range, Accumulation/Distribution, Money Flow Index, On Balance Volume, Volumes, Accelerator Oscillator, Awesome Oscillator, Gator Oscillator, Alligator, Market Facilitation Index, Parabolic SAR, Fractals, MACD, Stochastic Oscillator.The wide opportunities of the MetaTrader 5 trading software are now always with you. Download MetaTrader 5 to keep abreast of events in financial markets and control your trading account!

reviews.title: Unsupported device
reviews.comment: I am using galaxy mega 6.3 inch, when install this software \"\" unfortunately this device not supported\" I hope you can fix this bug. I needed for mobile trading. Thanks
reviews.author: Jono Wijaya

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: My phone cannot use candlestick chart. Hope u can fix it..thx...other that is very good just the chart..
reviews.author: KokEarng Charles

reviews.title: White lines... Seriously?!?
reviews.comment: Prior to the recent update everything was perfect. Now the lines on the chart type are white against a white background... Devs please fix this. Why on earth would you do that without allowing the user to change colors?
reviews.author: Jeffrey Kaiawe

reviews.title: Need to have a trailing stop loss option
reviews.comment: If this can be added it will be a wonderful addition that will add to the trading security. I tend to manually alter the stop loss as a trade progresses which is laborious as fraught with danger. An otherwise excellent trading platform and app.
reviews.author: Matthew Reid

reviews.title: Really good app
reviews.comment: Easy to use and great everyday indicators for when you are on the move, sometimes even easier to quickly flick through charts than on a PC.  The only addition that would really be helpful for me and I am sure others would be the function to apply a trailing stop?
reviews.author: David Hannigan
